mapper.select: select s.oa_staff_id, s.oa_staff_name, oa_staff_sex, s.oa_staff_entryTime, s.oa_staff_phone, oa_staff_birthday, st.oa_staffState_name, dept.oa_post_name, dept.oa_department_name, role.oa_role_name from oa_staff s LEFT JOIN (SELECT p.oa_post_id,p.oa_post_name,d.oa_department_name from oa_post p, oa_department d where p.oa_department_id = d.oa_department_id) dept ON dept.oa_post_id = s.oa_post_id LEFT JOIN oa_staffState st ON st.oa_staffState_id = s.oa_staffState_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT sr.oa_staff_id, r.oa_role_name FROM oa_role r, staff_role sr where sr.oa_role_id = r.oa_role_id ) role ON s.oa_staff_id = role.oa_staff_id;
mapper.update: update oa_staff set oa_staff_name = #{name}, oa_staff_entryTime = #{entryTime}, oa_staff_phone = #{phone}, oa_staff_birthday = #{birthday}, oa_staff_post = #{post}, oa_department_id = #{depId} where oa_staff_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.oa_staff_id, s.oa_staff_name, oa_staff_sex, oa_staff_phone, oa_staff_birthday, st.oa_staffState_name, oa_post_name, oa_department_name FROM `oa_staff` s, oa_post p, oa_department d, oa_staffState st WHERE s.oa_post_id = p.oa_post_id and p.oa_department_id = d.oa_department_id and oa_staff_phone = #{account} and oa_staff_pwd = #{password} and s.oa_staffState_id = st.oa_staffState_id;
